listitem.para: Changes the butfirst of the input list to be a given value.

WARNING: Primitives whose names start with a period are dangerous. Their use by non-experts is not recommended. The use of .SETBF can lead to circular list structures, which will get some Logo primitives into infinite loops; unexpected changes to other data structures that share storage with the list being modified; Logo crashes and core dumps if the butfirst of a list is not itself a list; and the permanent loss of memory if a circular structure is released.
